data.name: XMimeContentType
desc: An implementation of this interface represents a MIME content-type that conforms to Rfc2045 and Rfc2046.
Instances that implement this interface could be created using the interface XMimeContentTypeFactory.

methods.name: getFullMediaType
desc: To get the full media/submedia type of the MIME content-type.

methods.name: getMediaSubtype
desc: To get the media subtype of the MIME content-type.

methods.name: getMediaType
desc: To get the media type of the MIME content-type.

methods.name: getParameterValue
desc: To get the value of a specified parameter.

methods.name: getParameters
desc: To get a list of parameters that the MIME content-type contains.

methods.name: hasParameter
desc: To query if a specific parameter is supported.
A value of FALSE if the MIME content-type has not the specified parameter.
